title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.13 - Renewal hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.13 - Renewal hearings

State Regulations

In the discretion of the Authority, hearings may also be
held upon applications for renewal of licenses, under the foregoing provisions, insofar as applicable. Notice may be sent, even prior to receipt of an
application for renewal, in the form of a notice of contemplated disapproval, setting forth the grounds for the action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
52.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
